Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <wrxys> A newbie question. I'm supposed to be able to find my wallet.dat file here <system drive>/Users/<user name>/AppData/Roaming/Komodo/VRSC/wallet.dat, right? But with this latest AGAMA wallet, under Komodo folder, there is nothing but a file named as"komodo.conf". So where should I find my wallet.dat file? Thanks!

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <benohanlon> @JohnWestbrook my man ‚úäüèª

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <stretcher83> @wrxys is this the first time you have run agama wallet , if so maybe your antivirus blocked its full install and your wallet was unable to run properly and create all the other files it needs in the komodo folder

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <stretcher83> You could check your antivirus logs to see if anything got quarantined or blocked upon instillation of agama, if it did, i would deactivate your antivirus, then redownload agama again from veruscoin.io website and let it run for a bit , like 10 - 20 mins then add exemptions for agama in your antivirus, then enable your antivirus again

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <stretcher83> Add the agama folder that you downloaded in to exemptions and the komodo folder and the agama folder located in %appdata% folder on your system

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <stretcher83> Anti viruses can be the worlds biggest pain in the ü§¨ , especially with mining programs üòÇ
